channel.title: Looking for very experienced Team! Elunity!
channel.description:
Our project thread is here: https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,653410.0.html We're an experienced team looking for experienced team. Use your own layout to apply. Members in all areas including but not limited to: Advertising Development in general Community Managing
Thank you, The Elunity Team.

item.title: Looking for very experienced Team! Elunity!
item.dc:creator: @ruzylo Ruzylo
item.description:
@ruzylo wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:4, topic:534616”]I vouch for Nolan he was my lead administrator when I ran Final Judgement back in the day and he also can do more minor jobs when needed I know ( get i’d’s, idea bashing, and etc ) I have known him for a good progressive three years or more. He also was part of the team that helped to keep my barter system running smoothly and would keep me informed on what items have too many out there and etc. I used a program that would scan all of the items in a persons bank/equipped and would post the results of most of what items. (like the first 20 ) and he was always glad to help give me ideas on what needed to be changed/removed. (gold wasn’t very important in my server as it was nearly 100% barter)

He was also a decent beta tester ( cause he knows I was picky as hell about my server content )

CC’d to you in a pm/to nolan in a pm[/quote]Thanks again!

Read full topic
item.source: Looking for very experienced Team! Elunity!

item.title: Looking for very experienced Team! Elunity!
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

I vouch for Nolan he was my lead administrator when I ran Final Judgement back in the day and he also can do more minor jobs when needed I know ( get i’d’s, idea bashing, and etc ) I have known him for a good progressive three years or more. He also was part of the team that helped to keep my barter system running smoothly and would keep me informed on what items have too many out there and etc. I used a program that would scan all of the items in a persons bank/equipped and would post the results of most of what items. (like the first 20 ) and he was always glad to help give me ideas on what needed to be changed/removed. (gold wasn’t very important in my server as it was nearly 100% barter)

He was also a decent beta tester ( cause he knows I was picky as hell about my server content )

CC’d to you in a pm/to nolan in a pm
